data.name: Sex Adventures - Swingers Gym
data.detailed_description:
About the game

A visual novel about a hot couple trying a private gym. Everything takes a turn when a daring blonde starts hitting on the girlfriend.

Visual Novel Description

After insisting several times, Kevin finally manages to convince his girlfriend to try a new private gym.
He's heard that some naughty things are going on there, and he's curious to see if it's true.
Alessia is not as excited as her boyfriend and feels a little uncomfortable in the outfit he has chosen for her.
After a set of exercises, a hot blonde notices Alessia and challenges her to a spicy game in front of the boys.
Will she accept?
Will their boyfriends be okay with it?
Let's find out together in this erotic visual novel.

data.short_description: A visual novel about a hot couple trying a private gym. Everything takes a turn when a daring blonde starts hitting on the girlfriend.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

content_descriptors.notes: The game graphically depicts sex in still images and videos among various male/female characters involved in sexual swing.
